title: Characterisation of the formation of halobenzoquinone disinfection by-products in typical water sources at different water quality stages
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, 10,814-825
DOI: 10.1039/D3EW00397C, Paper
Zhangbin Pan, Hengjun Yao, Ke Lin, Yulong Liang, Wuchang Song, Junwei He, Zhenqi Du, Wenhai Chu, Ruibao Jia
As an emerging class of uncontrolled disinfection by-products, halobenzoquinones (HBQs) are 3 to 4 orders of magnitude more cytotoxic and genotoxic than regulated disinfection by-products.
